data.summary: The website has poor AI readiness with a score of 59.9. Major improvements are required across all categories to achieve effective LLM optimization.

top_5_critical_items: JavaScript-heavy rendering may hide content from AI parsers.
Content lacks question-based formatting used in LLM queries.
Limited citation signals reduce AI trustworthiness.
Missing meta descriptions affect AI platform visibility.
Poor heading structure impacts LLM content chunking.
top_5_warnings: Voice-search formatting is absent, impacting discovery.
data.llm_visibility_assessment: Poor AI discoverability. Content lacks LLM optimization with minimal structured signals, severely limiting citation potential and summary quality in AI platforms.
